statements: DELETE FROM security_incident_logs WHERE incident_id = 101 AND employee_id = 201;
DELETE FROM security_incident_logs WHERE timestamp < '2021-10-01' AND incident_type = 'Data Breach';
DELETE FROM breach_records WHERE id = 100 AND affected_records > 500;
DELETE FROM security_incidents WHERE severity >= 3 AND incident_type = 'Data Breach';
DELETE FROM SecurityIncidents WHERE incident_id = 1000 AND employee_id = 500;
DELETE FROM BreachLogs WHERE breach_type = 'Data Breach' AND breach_date < '2021-01-01';
DELETE FROM incident_logs WHERE log_id = 100 AND user_id = 5;
DELETE FROM security_incidents WHERE id = 100 AND severity = 3;
DELETE FROM forensic_reports WHERE incident_id = 200 AND investigator_name = 'John Doe';
